name: coal stove production, 5-15kW | coal stove, 5-15kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8508/documentation

This dataset represents the individual components of a 5-15 kW coal stove.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From unoccupied land forseen for the construction of a coal stove.

This activity ends with a constructed coal stove, having a lifetime of 30 years which corresponds to 1'600 load hours per year (chimney 80 years). The dataset includes apart the materials necessary for the coal stove also the construction efforts, land use as well as the disposal of all materials.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average coal stove installed in the early 1990s.

flow.name: coal stove, 5-15kW
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

exchanges.description:
Estimation. The largest area is needed for the storage of the coal. The area for the plant and the chimney is rather low. The theoretically different storage volumes due to different calorific values are not considered. The construction and demolition time is neglected. A rehabilitation period is omitted as it is expected that the area is reused as built-up area. 

Further references:
Jensch W. (1988) Vergleich von Energiesystemen unterschiedlicher Zentralisierung. IfE-Schriftenreihe Heft 22, München.

Estimation. Used material for the construction of the stove. Additionally a chimney is necessary. Therefore a five-storied apartment with five stoves is assumed and 486 kg of concrete and 1.8 kg of mineral wool are needed. The chimney will be depreciated over 80 years. 

Further references:
Jensch W. (1988) Vergleich von Energiesystemen unterschiedlicher Zentralisierung. IfE-Schriftenreihe Heft 22, München.
Plewnia M., Schmitz J., Huber W. (1983) Vergleich ausgewählter Heizungssysteme unter energetischen, ökonomischen und ökologischen Gesichtspunkten. Projekt Stand und Entwicklungstendenzen der Raumwärmeversorgung der Haushalte. Jül-Spez-234/Bd.3, Jülich.
EcoSpold01Location=CH
